Notes: 2 min instances @ 1 vCPU = 2 vCPU * 730 hrs * $0.00002400 = $35.04/month base. Per-request: avg 30s @ 2 vCPU
2 min instances @ 2GB = 4GB * 730 hrs * $0.00000250 = $7.30/month base. Per-request: avg 30s @ 4GB
$0.40 per million requests
2 min instances * (1 vCPU * $0.00002400 + 2GB * $0.00000250) * 730 hours/month
Per execution: 8 vCPU * 3600s avg * $0.00002400. Assumes 1 job per 10 requests
Per execution: 32GB * 3600s avg * $0.00000250. Assumes 1 job per 10 requests
$0.10 per execution (1 job per ~10 web requests)
$0.020 per GB/month. Idle: 80GB base data. Active: +1GB per 100 requests for results
$0.05 per 10K ops. Idle: 2K ops. Active: ~100 ops per request (writes/metadata)
$0.004 per 10K ops. Idle: 5K ops. Active: ~200 ops per request (reads)
$0.12 per GB egress. Assumes 1GB data transfer per 10 requests (downloading results)
$0.10 per GB/month for images. ~1GB for web+training images
6 secrets * $0.06 per secret/month (sf-private-key, sf-private-key-persistent, auth-client-id, auth-client-secret, auth-cookie-secret, metadata)
$0.03 per 10K accesses. ~10 secret reads per request
$0.10 per job/month. 3 jobs (queue tick prod, queue tick dev, health check)
First 3 jobs free, then $0.10/job. Scheduler invokes queue tick every minute = ~43.8K/month but within free tier
Small warehouse: $2/credit. Idle: 0. Active: Assumes 1 credit per 10 requests (varies by query complexity)
First 50GB/month free. $0.50/GB above. Idle: 10GB. Active: +0.5GB per 100 requests
First 30 days included in ingestion. Long-term storage minimal
Free - 3 service accounts (web-service-sa, training-job-sa, scheduler)
First 120 build-minutes/day free. CI/CD builds only on deploys, not per request
Cloud Run ingress free. But includes Cloud Armor/Load Balancer forwarding rules if used: ~$0.006/GB ingress
Rounded to nearest cent

Component: Average Web Request Duration: 30 seconds (CPU + memory time)
Average Training Job Duration: 1 hour (3600 seconds)
Training Job Frequency: 1 job per 10 web requests
Data Transfer: 1GB per 10 requests for downloading results
Base Storage: 80GB for historical data and artifacts
Storage Growth: +1GB per 100 requests for new results
Secret Access: ~10 reads per request (Snowflake, OAuth)
GCS Operations: ~100 Class A (writes), ~200 Class B (reads) per request
Snowflake: 1 compute credit per 10 requests (varies by query)
1. Reduce min_instances from 2 to 0 to eliminate $42.34/month idle cost (trade-off: cold starts)
2. Use Cloud Storage lifecycle policies to archive old results to Nearline ($0.010/GB) or Coldline ($0.004/GB)
3. Configure log retention policies to reduce log storage costs
4. Implement request caching to reduce Snowflake query costs
5. Compress training results before uploading to GCS to reduce storage and egress costs
6. Use Cloud Run jobs with spot/preemptible instances when available (up to 50% savings)
7. Consider regional vs. multi-regional GCS for cost vs. availability trade-off
8. Optimize Docker images to reduce Artifact Registry storage
